mapper.select: SELECT s.script_id, nf.category_id, sc.category_name, nf.file_name, s.is_recording, s.audio_file_id, f.saved_name AS audio_file_name, s.video_file_id, nf.folder_id, nf.is_important, nf.created_at, nf.updated_at FROM script s INNER JOIN note_file nf ON s.script_id = nf.script_id INNER JOIN script_category sc ON nf.category_id = sc.category_id LEFT JOIN file f on s.audio_file_id = f.file_id WHERE s.script_id = #{scriptId} AND s.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sp.paragraph_id, sp.script_id, sp.paragraph_sequence, sp.start_time, sp.end_time, sp.paragraph_content, sp.memo_content, sp.is_bookmarked, sp.created_at, sp.updated_at FROM script_paragraph sp INNER JOIN script s ON sp.script_id = s.script_id WHERE s.script_id = #{scriptId} AND s.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO script_paragraph (script_id, user_id, paragraph_sequence, start_time, end_time, paragraph_content, memo_content) VALUES (#{scriptId}, #{userId}, #{paragraphSequence}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{paragraphContent}, #{memoContent})
INSERT INTO script_paragraph_keyword (paragraph_id, user_id, keyword) VALUES (#{paragraphId}, #{userId}, #{keyword})
